attributes.action: up the age limit to drink alcahol to 21 years of age
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we think with the age limit at 21 years of age to drink alcahol would be a good idea cause it would prevent youths getting drunk and causing trouble and might produce less fights about the streets as alot come from people age 18 and under aged drinkers so we wish to propose to up the age limit to 21 years of age.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
